Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and with remains of two registers of black-painted hieratic text specifying contents as year 11 wine of the Aten domain.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389861) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389861)
